com.pump.desktop.error

Class BugReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.desktop.error.BugReporter

  • public class BugReporter
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float documentSizeLimit
      Only embed documents in incident archives if they are under this file size (measured in bytes)
      static boolean includeDocuments
      If true then users documents are embedded in incident archives.
      static boolean includeScreenshots
      If true then screenshots are embedded in incident archives.
      static boolean includeSessionLog
      If true then the session log is embedded in incident archives.

    • Field Detail

      • includeSessionLog

        public static boolean includeSessionLog
        If true then the session log is embedded in incident archives.

      • includeDocuments

        public static boolean includeDocuments
        If true then users documents are embedded in incident archives. (The file is identified by searching for the client property "Window.documentFile" on the root pane of frames.)

      • includeScreenshots

        public static boolean includeScreenshots
        If true then screenshots are embedded in incident archives.

      • documentSizeLimit

        public static float documentSizeLimit
        Only embed documents in incident archives if they are under this file size (measured in bytes)
